Address.Address1: Playa Las Coloradas , Cayo Coco 67210 Ciego De Avila Cuba

Description.Text:
The Pullman Cayo Coco has 568 rooms including 41 suites. All rooms are equipped with air conditioning, telephone, minibar, safe, LCD TV, iPod connection, acess to Internet/Wi-Fi (fee), kettle and private bathroom with hairdryer. It has rooms for people with reduced mobility. This hotel includes 8 restaurants of different specialties, 10 bars, a Spa and Wellness center with 4 massage rooms, 2 saunas, 2 Jacuzzis and hairdresser. It also includes 7 outdoors pools, gym, 2 tennis courts and 4 meeting and events rooms with technological and audiovisual equipment. Also note the room service, the 24-hour reception service, laundry, ironing service, currency exchange deposit, access to Internet / Wi-Fi for a fee, rent-a-car, medical service, business center, babysitting service and car parking.
The Pullman Cayo Coco is located in the heart of the ecological park of Cayo Coco Island. From the Jardines del Rey International Airport to the hotel is 12 km.
Total Rooms: 568 Suites: 41 Disabled Rooms: 4
